name: treatment of inert waste, inert material landfill | inert waste, for final disposal | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/6879/documentation

This dataset represents the activity of waste disposal of 'inert waste, for final disposal'  in an inert material landfill.

The activity starts with the waste being available at the gate of the treatment facility. Collection and transportation of the waste to the treatment plant is not included.

The activity ends with the waste being treated and no direct emissions from inert material landfill (leachate) are inventoried, as they are considered negligible. The dataset contains only exchanges to process-specific burdens (energy, land use) and infrastructure.
category: E:Water supply; sewerage, waste management and remediation activities/38:Waste collection, treatment and disposal activities; materials recovery/382:Waste treatment and disposal/3821:Treatment and disposal of non-hazardous waste

processDocumentation.geographyDescription: Modelling parameters affecting the treatment technology are specific to this geography and to the technology mix encountered in Switzerland in 2000.
processDocumentation.technologyDescription: Inert material landfill with leachate collection system and renaturation after closure. 50% of the sites is equipped with a base seal.
